Bash(powershell.exe -Command " $dllPath = ''C:\\Users\\maxim\\.nuget\\packages\\jetbrains.psi.features.core\\233.0.20240606.112012\\DotFiles\\JetBrains.ReSharper.Feature.Services.dll'' try { $bytes = [System.IO.File]::ReadAllBytes\($dllPath\) $text = [System.Text.Encoding]::Unicode.GetString\($bytes\) $idx = $text.IndexOf\(''PsiFeaturesImplZone''\) if \($idx -ge 0\) { Write-Host $text.Substring\([Math]::Max\(0,$idx-100\), 300\) } else { Write-Host ''Not found in Unicode'' } } catch { Write-Host $_.Exception.Message } ")

Bash(python3 -c " import os, struct def find_in_dll\(path, search\): with open\(path, ''rb''\) as f: data = f.read\(\) # Search UTF-16 LE needle = search.encode\(''utf-16-le''\) results = [] idx = 0 while True: idx = data.find\(needle, idx\) if idx == -1: break # Grab surrounding context \(as UTF-16\) start = max\(0, idx - 200\) end = min\(len\(data\), idx + len\(needle\) + 200\) chunk = data[start:end] try: text = chunk.decode\(''utf-16-le'', errors=''replace''\) results.append\(text\) except: pass idx += len\(needle\) return results search = ''PsiFeaturesImplZone'' base = ''/c/Users/maxim/.nuget/packages/jetbrains.psi.features.core/233.0.20240606.112012/DotFiles'' for fname in os.listdir\(base\): if fname.endswith\(''.dll''\): path = os.path.join\(base, fname\) hits = find_in_dll\(path, search\) if hits: print\(f''=== {fname} ===''\) for h in hits: print\(h[:300]\) print\(\) ")
